voldemort.store.compress
Class SnappyCompressionStrategy

java.lang.Object
  voldemort.store.compress.StreamCompressionStrategy
      voldemort.store.compress.SnappyCompressionStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompressionStrategy
@Experimental
public class SnappyCompressionStrategy
extends StreamCompressionStrategy

Implementation of CompressionStrategy for the Snappy format. Snappy is optimized for speed. TODO Use block encoding instead of streams for better performance, see: https://github.com/dain/snappy/issues/4. Also be aware that the stream format may not be finalised yet.
